changePlan.question: Can I change my plan anytime?
changePlan.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be prorated and reflected in your next billing cycle.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We currently accept Visa and Mastercard credit and debit cards for all subscription plans.

freeTrial.question: Is there a free trial available?
freeTrial.answer: Yes! All users receive 5 free image generations upon registration, plus one additional free image every day to explore our platform.

proFeatures.question: What advanced features does the Pro plan offer?
proFeatures.answer: Pro users unlock unlimited image generation, private content creation, negative prompts for better control, bulk image generation, custom image sizes, LoRA model toggles, custom CFG scale control, custom inference steps, the ability to choose your own seed, and 100 seconds of video to generate each month.

contentAfterCancel.question: What happens to my content if I cancel?
contentAfterCancel.answer: Your generated content will remain in your account. You can manage and delete your content at any time, or request complete account deletion through our support team.

refunds.question: Do you offer refunds?
refunds.answer: We do not offer refunds on subscription plans. However, you can cancel your subscription at any time to prevent future charges.

commercialUse.question: Can I use generated content commercially?
commercialUse.answer: Yes, you have full commercial usage rights for all content generated through our platform across all subscription plans.

terms.metaDescription: Read our terms of service and conditions for using PornSpot.ai AI-generated adult content platform.
terms.title: Terms of Service

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to PornSpot.ai, operated by Fabularius AI SAS, a French company registered in Annecy, France (Reg number: 943 919 423 R.C.S. Annecy), located at 2 avenue gambetta, 74000, Annecy, France. These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By creating an account or using our services, you confirm that you are at least 18 years old and have the legal capacity to enter into these Terms. You agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

services.title: Our Services
services.content: PornSpot.ai provides AI-powered content generation services for adult entertainment. Our platform allows users to create, view, and manage AI-generated adult content based on their subscription plan.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms.

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions and Payments
subscriptions.content: Our services are available through various subscription plans. Payment is processed securely through our payment providers. Subscriptions automatically renew unless cancelled. Refunds are provided in accordance with our refund policy.

automatedUsage.title: Automated Usage Restrictions
automatedUsage.content: The use of software, bots, scripts, or any form of automation to generate images or access our AI generation services is strictly prohibited. Our subscription plans are designed for reasonable human usage only. Any attempt to automate image generation, bulk processing, or circumvent usage limitations will result in immediate account suspension or termination. Users must interact with our platform manually and within the intended usage patterns of their subscription plan.

commercialUse.title: Commercial Use Restrictions
commercialUse.content: Only images generated by the user themselves through their own account may be used for commercial purposes. Users are strictly prohibited from using, distributing, selling, or otherwise commercially exploiting images generated by other users on the platform. Each user retains commercial rights exclusively to their own generated content. Violation of this policy may result in legal action and immediate account termination.

websiteScraping.title: Website Scraping and Automated Discovery Prohibition
websiteScraping.content: Scraping, crawling, or automated extraction of any content, data, or information from our website is strictly forbidden. This includes but is not limited to: automated downloading of images, systematic collection of user data, automated discovery or indexing of website content, and any form of automated interaction with our website beyond normal browser usage. Such activities may result in immediate IP blocking, legal action, and account termination.

contentPolicy.title: Content Policy
contentPolicy.content: All content generated through our platform must comply with applicable laws. Users are prohibited from creating content involving minors, non-consent, or illegal activities. We reserve the right to remove content that violates our policies.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: Users retain rights to content they generate through our platform. However, by using our services, you grant us a license to display, store, and process your content as necessary to provide our services.

privacy.title: Privacy and Data Protection
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. We comply with applicable data protection laws.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibited.content: You may not use our services for illegal purposes, to harass others, to distribute malware, or to violate others' rights. Violation of these restrictions may result in account termination.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account at any time for violation of these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use our services ceases immediately. Data retention is governed by our Privacy Policy.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: Our services are provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee uninterrupted service, error-free operation, or specific results from our AI generation technology.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the fullest extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of our services.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with applicable laws. Any disputes will be resolved through binding arbitration or in courts of competent jurisdiction.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of material changes via email or platform notifications. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have questions about these Terms, please contact us through our support channels or at the contact information provided on our website. You can reach Fabularius AI SAS at: 2 avenue gambetta, 74000, Annecy, France. Reg number: 943 919 423 R.C.S. Annecy.

ui.questionsDescription: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please don't hesitate to contact us.

privacy.metaDescription: Read our privacy policy to understand how PornSpot.ai collects, uses, and protects your personal information.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At PornSpot.ai, operated by Fabularius AI SAS, a French company registered in Annecy, France (Reg number: 943 919 423 R.C.S. Annecy), located at 2 avenue gambetta, 74000, Annecy, France, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our AI-powered adult content generation platform.

informationWe.title: Information We Collect
informationWe.content: We collect information directly from you when you register or use our generation forms on our servers. This includes: email address, username, subscription information, content generation preferences, AI prompts you submit, and payment information (processed securely by third-party providers). We do not use advanced trackers beyond essential functionality. Data collection occurs directly on our AWS servers when you register or use our image generation features.

howWe.title: How We Use Your Information
howWe.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, send you technical notices and support messages, and communicate with you about products, services, and promotional offers.

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or share your personal information with third parties. Our only third-party service is SendGrid for email delivery, to which we only send email addresses and usernames - no other personal data is shared. SendGrid may retain logs of email addresses used for delivery purposes. Your generated content, prompts, and other personal information remain strictly confidential within our AWS infrastructure.

dataStorage.title: Data Storage and Security
dataStorage.content: Your data is securely stored on AWS us-east-1 servers with TLS 1.3 encryption for all data in transit. We use bcrypt encryption for user passwords (minimum 12 rounds with unique salt) for users who register directly. Users who sign in via Google Login do not share passwords with us. All sensitive NSFW content and prompts are stored securely within our AWS infrastructure. We implement automated AI-based moderation (LLM-as-a-judge) and manual content review for all user prompts and generated images.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use two types of cookies: (1) Essential cookies for maintaining your preferred language setting to display content appropriately, and (2) Analytics cookies via Google Analytics to understand website usage patterns. We do not use advertising or tracking cookies beyond these essential functions. You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings, though disabling essential cookies may affect site functionality.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: Images not saved by users are instantly and permanently deleted along with their associated prompts and metadata. For saved content, we retain your data indefinitely to ensure service quality and continuity. This includes: user prompts (kept indefinitely to improve our services), generated images and albums (preserved to maintain your library), usage statistics (for internal analytics), and account information (to provide ongoing service). Data is retained to guarantee that your image library and prompts are never lost. You may request account deletion by contacting support@pornspot.ai, though this will result in permanent loss of all generated content.

yourRights.title: Your Privacy Rights
yourRights.content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including the right to access, update, or delete your information. You may also have the right to restrict or object to certain processing of your data. We provide dashboard tools in your user account that allow you to access, view, and permanently delete your data instantly at your discretion.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our service is not directed to individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 18, we will take steps to delete such information.

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: We are a French company that stores all data directly on AWS us-east-1 servers in the United States. Your data does not leave the United States infrastructure. There are no additional international transfers beyond the initial hosting in AWS US regions. This arrangement ensures consistent data protection standards under AWS security protocols.

gdprCompliance.title: GDPR Compliance
gdprCompliance.content: If you are a resident of the European Economic Area (EEA), you have certain data protection rights. We aim to take reasonable steps to allow you to correct, amend, delete, or limit the use of your personal information.

californiaCcpa.title: California Privacy Rights (CCPA)
californiaCcpa.content: If you are a California resident, you have specific rights regarding your personal information, including the right to know what personal information we collect, use, disclose, and sell, and the right to delete your personal information.

thirdPartyLinks.title: Third-Party Links
thirdPartyLinks.content: Our service may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties. We encourage you to read their privacy policies before providing any information. You can review our third-party service privacy policies: SendGrid Privacy Policy (https://www.twilio.com/en-us/legal/privacy) and Google Login Privacy Policy (https://policies.google.com/privacy).

policyChanges.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
policyChanges.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date. Changes become effective immediately upon posting.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, GDPR requests, or data protection concerns, please contact us at support@pornspot.ai or through our support channels. You can reach Fabularius AI SAS at: 2 avenue gambetta, 74000, Annecy, France. Reg number: 943 919 423 R.C.S. Annecy. For GDPR and data protection matters, our Data Protection Officer (DPO) is Daniel Febrero, 2 avenue Gambetta, 74000 Annecy, France. For complaints and GDPR-type requests, email us directly at support@pornspot.ai.

aiEthics.title: AI and Ethics
aiEthics.content: In accordance with emerging standards (UNESCO, AI Act, ISO/IEC 42001): Transparency - We document AI processes affecting your data, accessible upon request. Non-discrimination - Our algorithms are audited to minimize bias (e.g., gender or cultural bias in content generation). Sensitive content - NSFW prompts and images are isolated and never reused without explicit consent. Data protection - We do not train AI models with user data. AI Act NSFW-specific risks: We prevent celebrity reproduction and deepfake creation by prohibiting image uploads and filtering prompts for any celebrity references.

ukGdpr.title: UK GDPR Compliance
ukGdpr.content: For UK residents, we comply with the UK's implementation of GDPR (Data Protection Act 2018). You have the right to access, rectify, erase, restrict processing, data portability, and object to processing of your personal data. You may also withdraw consent at any time. To exercise these rights or file a complaint, contact us at support@pornspot.ai or lodge a complaint with the UK Information Commissioner's Office (ICO).

ui.questionsDescription: If you have any questions about how we handle your data, please don't hesitate to contact us.
